section.title: Requirements
section.para: The following Features need to be installed in order to start Swing AUTs:

listitem.para: Jubula Launch Support for JavaFX / Swing

section.para: The following Features need to be installed in order to start RCP AUTs:

listitem.para: Jubula Launch Support for Eclipse RCP

section.para: You can find an update site containing the Jubula Feature and the Launch Integration in the correct version for each standalone version in the installation directory in the development folder.
